2153.subject: IST
2153.descrlong:
Directed Research and Development:  Provide a framework for a substantial research and development effort beyond a typical capstone project: ideation, proposal writing, project management, presentation, documentation and/or evaluation. IST 696 provides one-on-one guidance on students' research and development effort within the School of Information Technology and Communications Design disciplines. 
Level: Graduate  (Elective)
